tweet.html: RT @tei_publisher: Special thanks to @HistoryAtState for spearheading and funding the efforts which resulted in the annotation editor! And big thanks to Bernoulli-Euler Zentrum @UniBasel for sponsoring the Math feature! Interested in sponsoring a release? Get in contact with @EEditiones https://t.co/7bPAFzNOwD
